name: TokiMal
overview: Being the cousin of a famous ape is not easy. You are always compared to him whatever you do. Now, your girlfriend wants to test you and has decided to kidnap herself and go with the most thug monkey in Jujuland: Monolete. You will not tolerate this, and you will fight against every creature that dares to cross your path. You will recover your beautiful ape friend to show how cool you are, and she will never call you Tokimal again.
